HAWK Token Sale is Live

Your turn to connect will end in:
First Come First Served
Sale Progress 91.6%

Launch Details

Pre-Sale Round

$ 0.008 / TOKEN
  • 50M Tokens
  • 20% at TGE
  • Linear vesting for 4 weeks
  • Minimum Purchase: 0.2 BNB

Public Sale Round

$ 0.012 / TOKEN
  • 200M Tokens
  • 30% at TGE
  • Linear vesting for 2 weeks
  • Minimum Purchase: 0.2 BNB

Expected Listing Price

$ 0.015 / TOKEN
  • Pancake (After Sale)
  • Marketplace (After Sale)
  • MEXC (May)
  • Tier 1 CEX (June)

Road Map

October 2021

Litepaper Release

All you need to know to get our ecosystem.

 
December 2021

Partner Announcements

As we’re currently onboarding more launch partners, we’ll set the spotlight on some of use-cases.

Q1 2022

More Chain Launches

Seamlessly connecting all the different blockchains is the next important step.

Q2 2022

Incentive Program

Opportunity for the community to team up and help the world.

Q3 2022

Testnet Launch

Public environment for development and testing functions to work with.

Q4 2022

MainnetLaunch

Decentralizing & democratizing the direction of the network.

Product

GameFi

Decentralized computation, storage, and hosting, and a proprietary oracle for play-to-earn economies.

DeFi

Decentralized cloud services and white label liquidity bootstrappers including farms, bridges, and staking.

dApps

Putting the decentralized in dApps: remove centralized points of cloud failures, node networks, and data security.

Cross-chain Marketplace

Choose from 30+ cryptocurrencies

Powered by dSynths, a synthetic trading platform. They’re backed by the trading engine of DEUS Finance, which uses price feeds, that are able to support the pricing of over 50,000 assets!

 
Up to

8.5%

p.a. on cryptos
Up to

14%

p.a. on stablecoins

Features

Portal to DeFi Investment

Access DeFi opportunities aggregated Through one easy-to-use interface. Make educated investment decisions With facts and mechanics explained.

Marketplace for Strategy

Advanced algorithms to unleash the True potential of yield-farming. Empower community developers To build applications with our SDK.

Simple Process

This structure opens up dApps to a much broader range of functions, blockchains, oracles, chain data than being limited to a single chain.

Cross-chain Enabled

Enable the free flow of liquidity among Various blockchain networks supported. With the bridge solutions integrated, No more cross-chain for users.

Community Driven

Always relevant and ever-evolving by Staying close to the community. Make your voice heard and lead the way For through economy.

Go Anywhere

Creates bridges between all blockchains of bridges and not limited to tokens. Any type of data can be bridged cross-chain with tokens.

FAQs

How can I contribute in project?

You need to connect metamask wallet to buy tokens. It is first come first serve.

When I receive the purchased Token?

Tokens will be distributed to your metamask wallet address depending on the sale period.

When will Tokens be traded on exchanges?

We are working with some big CEX exchanges and will update soon.

Early Investors
